description: The date-time stamp that the object was last modified.
specification: This object represents the Modified property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification at <url>.  Copyright (c) 2013, Avocent & Hewlett-Packard.  All rights reserved.  The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Modified*
